data.actual_result: The animation brings the pop-out modal across the users and cropping over avatars.
data.expected_result: The pop-out modal is flush with the left-side of the highlightable box when hovering over users.
data.short_description: When clicking a user in the online list, the pop-out modal overlaps across the other members
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any discord server. - Click a user in the list. - Observe the pop-out modal.
